body.p: Control plane backups are currently unavailable due to an incorrect file path.
The location of the cacert in the xtrabackup-helper.conf file does not match the actual location of the file.

To correct the file path:
SSH into the control plane instance
Open this file for editing: /usr/libexec/os-apply-config/templates/etc/xtrabackup-helper.conf
Change this line: export OS_CACERT=/usr/local/share/ca-certificates/from-heat-ca.crt to this: export OS_CACERT=/etc/ssl/from-heat-ca.crt
Runos-refresh-config
Verify that this file: /etc/xtrabackup-helper.conf contains the modified value for the file path.
Verify that backups are run and uploaded to Swift hourly.
